section.content:
In 2016-2017 start of the entrepreneurship and success together program for women
project leaders in border regions of Tunisia

2017 three training sessions in the northern and southern regions of Tunisia 50 participants
Activities covered by local radio stations

2018 A cross-border Tunisia-Algeria-Libya meeting for women project leaders who
grouped together 40 participants
2019 cross-border entrepreneurship training for women from Tunisia and Libya

2020 entrepreneurship training and fight against irregular immigration for young people in
partnership with the social training and communication cooperative (11-month program)
